article_title: Orthotic Co. Says No Connection Between Audits, Stock Drop
article_text:
Orthotic Co. Says No Connection Between Audits, Stock Drop

Law360, New York (September 15, 2015, 3:29 PM ET) -- An orthotic and prosthetic patient-care services provider told a Texas federal judge Monday that a securities suit brought by a retirement fund couldn’t connect the dots between disappointing financials and Medicare audits it faced after the passage of the Affordable Care Act.



Austin, Texas-based Hanger Inc. said that the “fundamental problem” for the City of Pontiac General Employees’ Retirement System, which lodged the putative class action in November, was that there was “absolutely no connection” between the company’s admitted accounting errors and the alleged issues with...
